# authentik_property_mapping_saml (Resource)

Manage SAML Provider Property mappings

~> This resource is deprecated. Migrate to `authentik_property_mapping_provider_saml`.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `expression` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `saml_name` (String)

### Optional

- `friendly_name` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `meta_app` (String) Defaults to `authentik_providers_saml`. Generated.
- `meta_model` (String) Defaults to `samlpropertymapping`. Generated.
